model_input:

CRITERION:
Helpfulness - A more helpful MEMORY should provide more, richer speaker information related to DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Now choose the MEMORY that has better Helpfulness.

DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Husband: I hung up some more lights and candles today.
Wife: That's lovely! I always feel so cozy and comfortable when you do that.
Husband: I know, and I love making the apartment feel like a warm and welcoming space for you.
Wife: You always go above and beyond, dear.
Husband: It's the little things that count, right?
Wife: Definitely. Speaking of little things, do you remember when you told me about catching the bus just in time a few months ago?
Husband: Oh yes, I remember. I was so relieved I didn't have to wait in the cold for the next one.
Wife: It's amazing how small moments like that can make such a big difference in our day, isn't it?
Husband: Absolutely. It's the small moments that make life worth living.
Wife: And speaking of living, you mentioned a while back how involved you are in the different ministries at church. 

MEMORY 1:
The husband enjoys spending quality time with his friend and cherishes their bond, feeling uplifted and at ease in their presence. He also treasures the supportive community of believers at church and is actively engaged in various ministries, finding strength in his faith. 
Both the husband and wife prioritize the small, meaningful moments in life that contribute to their overall happiness and well-being. 
The husband values reliability in his relationships and eagerly anticipates collaborating on a podcast project. Additionally, he finds joy in the simple pleasures of life, like making it to the bus on time.

MEMORY 2:
User Description: Wife is supportive of Husband's faith journey and is happy to see him passionate about his beliefs. She values close relationships and believes that it's the little things that make life meaningful. Wife is glad that Husband has trustworthy friends and believes in the importance of having interests and hobbies outside of work and family life. 

Relationship Description: Wife is supportive and happy for Husband, showing a level of intimacy in their relationship. She values Husband's faith journey and enjoys seeing him passionate about his beliefs. 

Event Description: Husband had a great time hanging out with his friend and catching up on ideas for a new project. He is looking forward to working on the project and believes in the importance of having interests outside of work. Wife is glad that Husband had a good time and appreciates having someone trustworthy in his life. Husband also made it on time to catch the bus, which gave him an adrenaline rush and made him feel lucky. Wife remembers Husband being baptized and is supportive of his involvement in church ministries. Both Husband and Wife cherish their relationship and the connections they have in life.

YOUR OUTPUT:
prediction:

It also elaborates on the event descriptions, such as the husband's excitement about a new project, his enjoyment of simple pleasures like catching the bus on time, and the wife's observations of these moments, which are closely related to the dialogue context.
